summary: A comprehensive test suite for the SMB RPC components of the Impacket library, exercising LDAP, NDR, NetBIOS name service, NTLM, SPNEGO, WMI, secret dumping, and SMB server/client interactions across multiple protocol versions and transport layers to verify connection handling, authentication, data serialization, and protocol compliance.
business_intent: Validate the correctness, security, and interoperability of SMB RPC implementations used in network security tools and penetration testing frameworks, ensuring reliable operation and detection of potential vulnerabilities.
